thread.title: Macau's Casino Lisboa is a world famous symbol of its gaming industry, but Beijing is pushing for the city to evolve beyond its casinos
thread.title_full: Macau's Casino Lisboa is a world famous symbol of its gaming industry, but Beijing is pushing for the city to evolve beyond its casinos

author: Eduardo Leal
title: Macau's Casino Lisboa is a world famous symbol of its gaming industry, but Beijing is pushing for the city to evolve beyond its casinos
text:
Macau's Casino Lisboa is a world famous symbol of its gaming industry, but Beijing is pushing for the city to evolve beyond its casinos Eduardo Leal Dec 17, 2024 Dec 17, 2024 Updated 8 mins ago 0 Facebook WhatsApp SMS Print Copy article link Save Macau's Casino Lisboa is a world famous symbol of its gaming industry, but Beijing is pushing for the city to evolve beyond its casinos Eduardo Leal Tags Partners/afp As featured on +5 Chinese casino hub Macau struggles to evolve beyond gaming In the shadow of the Grand Lisboa, the Macau casino world-famous for its "golden lotus" design, fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong wonders if the economic miracle that initially made her fortune has now cast her aside. +5 Chinese casino hub Macau struggles to evolve beyond gaming In the shadow of the Grand Lisboa, the Macau casino world-famous for its "golden lotus" design, fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong wonders if the economic miracle that initially made her fortune has now cast her aside.
